title: Porky Run - Android Wear
description: Just your typical keep-a-pig-running-and-jumping-through-an-endless-and-randomly-generated-mulit-level-terrain game.Keep your pig running by jumping over a randomly generated and endless terrain.  Game-play is simple.  Tap the screen to make the pig jump across the terrain!  If you are too slow to jump over obstacles, then your little porker will get left behind.  Try the full version for phones and tablets to compete against your friends and the rest of the world with global score tracking.
descriptionHTML:
Just your typical keep-a-pig-running-and-jumping-through-an-endless-and-randomly-generated-mulit-level-terrain game.

Keep your pig running by jumping over a randomly generated and endless terrain. Game-play is simple. Tap the screen to make the pig jump across the terrain! If you are too slow to jump over obstacles, then your little porker will get left behind.

Try the full version for phones and tablets to compete against your friends and the rest of the world with global score tracking.
comments: Its alright Its an alright game but not much too it
